thread.title: Bill Maher Wanted Piers Morgan to Slam Trump, When He Instead Drops Harsh Reality Bomb Watch What Happens…
thread.title_full: Bill Maher Wanted Piers Morgan to Slam Trump, When He Instead Drops Harsh Reality Bomb Watch What Happens…

author: Nickarama
title: Bill Maher Wanted Piers Morgan to Slam Trump, When He Instead Drops Harsh Reality Bomb Watch What Happens…
text:
11:22am February 12,   
Piers Morgan, hardly a conservative, made an attempt to defend   during an appearance on the ‘Real Time With Bill Maher’ show on HBO. 
But Morgan could barely get two words out to explain why Trump’s travel ban was not a “Muslim ban” before he was attacked by comic Jim Jefferies. 
WARNING: Graphic Language 
Bill Maher: “The people who said during the campaign that Hillary Clinton was the lesser of two evils, could we get the apology right now?” 
Piers Morgan: “Why?!” 
Bill Maher: “Are you serious?!” 
Piers Morgan: “I’m serious” 
… 
Bill Maher: “…(Hillary) wouldn’t have a Muslim ban…” 
Piers Morgan: “Calm down Bill, there is no Muslim ban.” 
Jim Jefferies: “F*ck Off! F*ck Off!” 
Facts didn’t matter. 
The fact that the travel ban doesn’t affect most of the world’s Muslim’s didn’t matter, as Morgan observed. 
The threat of terrorism or the security of Americans didn’t matter. 
Just shut up, you are not pushing the approved line. 
This is why the left lost, but they still don’t get it. LIKE this article?
